Text.text: Welcome, you who are learned in the ways of mushrooms, to my fantastical fungi farm. You must be wondering why I've brought you here today. Well, the answer is quite simple...
Text.speaker: AGARICUS

Text.text: I, the great wizard Agaricus, have discovered the secret to infinite magical power!! That's right. With an abundance of fungal spores, even the weakest magical practitioner can crank their output up to 11!
Text.speaker: AGARICUS

Text.text: But there's one problem. I can't seem to make these mushrooms grow as quickly as I need them to. Simply put - I need spores. Thousands of spores. No, millions!! I need nine billion spores, and I need them right now!!
Text.speaker: AGARICUS

Text.text: With your help, I can surely become the greatest wizard the world has ever known. The Sultan of Spores. The Mikado of Mycobiota. The Czar of Calcarisporiellaceae...
Text.speaker: AGARICUS

Text.text: And if you fail? Why, I'll just turn you into a toadstool. It's a foolproof plan.
Text.speaker: AGARICUS

Text.text: Go, my learned friend! Grow like your life depends on it! Because it does!
Text.speaker: AGARICUS
